tool_description: Protect against suspicious logins on your app, powered by AI
name: LoginLlama
title: LoginLlama

api_list.name: check.login
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://loginllama.p.rapidapi.com/login/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "loginllama.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://loginllama.p.rapidapi.com/login/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "loginllama.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
